personal.name: Umer Qureshi
personal.title: Ethical Hacker
personal.bio:
I'm Muhammad Umer Qureshi, a dedicated Computer Systems Engineering student at MUET Jamshoro, passionate about leveraging technology to solve real-world problems. My journey in tech spans across multiple domains including cybersecurity, artificial intelligence, and full-stack development.

With a strong foundation in both theoretical concepts and practical implementation, I strive to create innovative solutions that make a meaningful impact. My expertise ranges from developing secure web applications to implementing AI-powered systems and IoT solutions.

projects.title: Modern Portfolio
projects.description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with React and TypeScript.

projects.title: Chatrix - AI Powered Chat App
projects.description: Advanced AI chatbot application with real-time messaging, multiple AI models integration, and modern UI/UX design. Features include conversation history

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Developing modern web applications using React and Node.js.

experience.title: Cyber Security Analyst
experience.description: At nadra i work as a penetration tester and found many bugs and vulnerabilities in different systems and helped my team to make infrastructure more secure.
